name: qdice.wtf
description:
Qdice is a turn-based multiplayer strategy game.

Conquer the map by attacking your opponents territories. You will roll the number of dice your land has, against the number of dice of the target land.

After your turn you will receive one die per connected land. That means you should stay connected, and try to cut off your opponents.

If there aren't any human players online, you can play against some bots that will join after you. You can also enable push-notifications to try to join someone else later.

No signup required.
